description: First differences of Thue-Morse sequence A001285.
comments: Fixed point of the morphism a->abc, b->ac, c->b, with a = 1, b = 0, c = -1, starting with a(1) = 1. - _Philippe Deléham_
links: J.-P. Allouche and Jeffrey Shallit, The Ubiquitous Prouhet-Thue-Morse Sequence, in C. Ding. T. Helleseth and H. Niederreiter, eds., Sequences and Their Applications: Proceedings of SETA '98, Springer-Verlag, 1999, pp. 1-16.
T. W. Cusick, H. Fredricksen and P. Stănică, On the delta sequence of the Thue-Morse sequence, Australas. J. Combin. 39 (2007), 293--300. [From _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 11 2009]
formula: Recurrence: a(4n) = a(n), a(4n+1) = a(2n+1), a(4n+2) = 0, a(4n+3) = -a(2n+1), starting a(1) = 1.a(n) = 2 - A007413(n). a(A036554(n)) = 0; a(A091785(n)) = -1; a(A091855(n)) = 1. - _Philippe Deléham_, Mar 20 2004G.f. A(x) satisfies 0=f(A(x), A(x^2), A(x^4)) where f(u, v, w)=-v+w+u^2-v^2+2w^2-2uw. - _Michael Somos_, Jul 08 2004
